button.style: font-size: 18px; background-color: greenyellow; border: 2px solid green; margin: 1em 0;padding: 7px 16px; border-radius: 10px;

resources.string:
Hello ! The One Time Password to login for Staff panel is

+ sendotp + "

This OTP will expire in 10 minutes Regards, Meridean Overseas Edu Con Pvt Ltd
"
